items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Document Management - E-books

*   [Kavita](https://www.kavitareader.com/) - Cross-platform e-book/manga/comic/pdf server and web reader with user management, ratings and reviews, and metadata support. ([Demo](https://www.kavitareader.com/#demo), [Source Code (‚≠ê8.3k)](https://github.com/Kareadita/Kavita)) `GPL-3.0` `.NET/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Document Management - E-books

  • Kavita - Cross-platform e-book/manga/comic/pdf server and web reader with user management, ratings and reviews, and metadata support. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê8.3k)) GPL-3.0 .NET/Docker

items.title: Urban and Regional Planning Resources
items.content_text:
### Public Data Resources / Energy and Natural Resources

*   [Low-Income Energy Affordability Data (LEAD)](https://www.energy.gov/scep/low-income-energy-affordability-data-lead-tool-and-community-energy-solutions) -  A free online tool by the U.S. Department of Energy. This interactive platform helps users make data-driven decisions on energy goals and program planning by improving their understanding of low-income and moderate-income household energy characteristics.
*   [State and Local Planning for Energy (SLOPE) Platform](https://maps.nrel.gov/slope/) - A free easy-to-access online platform, by the U.S. Department of Energy, to support data-driven state and local energy and decarbonization planning. SLOPE includes two distinct tools namely the Scenario Planner and the Data Viewer to support jurisdictions planning needs.
items.content_html:
Public Data Resources / Energy and Natural Resources

  • Low-Income Energy Affordability Data (LEAD) - A free online tool by the U.S. Department of Energy. This interactive platform helps users make data-driven decisions on energy goals and program planning by improving their understanding of low-income and moderate-income household energy characteristics.
  • State and Local Planning for Energy (SLOPE) Platform - A free easy-to-access online platform, by the U.S. Department of Energy, to support data-driven state and local energy and decarbonization planning. SLOPE includes two distinct tools namely the Scenario Planner and the Data Viewer to support jurisdictions planning needs.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### APIs, Data, and ML

*   [PDF-API.io](https://pdf-api.io) - PDF Automation API, visual template editor or HTML to PDF, dynamic data integration, and PDF rendering with an API. The free plan comes with one template, 100 PDFs/month.
items.content_html:
APIs, Data, and ML

  • PDF-API.io - PDF Automation API, visual template editor or HTML to PDF, dynamic data integration, and PDF rendering with an API. The free plan comes with one template, 100 PDFs/month.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [yx5300 (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/yx5300.py) - MP3 player that can be controlled via a serial interface.

### Display / E-Paper

*   [uc8151\_micropython (‚≠ê151)](https://github.com/antirez/uc8151_micropython) - UC8151 / IL0373 MicroPython e-paper display driver with support for greyscales and fast updates.

### Display / LCD Character

*   [micropython\_i2c\_lcd (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/Thomascountz/micropython_i2c_lcd) - MicroPython library for interacting with HD44780-based LCD displays through a PCF8574 I/O expander. It offers a high-level API for LCD control, including text display, cursor manipulation, and backlight settings, while also providing lower-level access to the GPIO operations on the PCF8574.

### Display / LED Matrix

*   [LED\_panel\_upy (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/CatMeowByte/LED_panel_upy) - MicroPython driver module for Panel P10 32x16 Matrix display and its variants.

### IO / Multiplexer

*   [tca9548a (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/tca9548a.py) - MicroPython driver for the TCA9548A I2C multiplexer.

### Sensors / Biometric

*   [max30102 (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/max30102.py) - MicroPython driver for the MAX30102, with heartbeat detection and BPM measurement.

### Sensors / Camera

*   [huskylib (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/huskylib.py) - MicroPython driver for the DFRobot Husky Lens. An easy-to-use AI Camera / Vision Sensor, featuring face recognition, object tracking, object recognition, line tracking, color recognition, and QR code recognition.

### Sensors / Distance Laser

*   [vl53l1x (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/vl53l1x.py) - MicroPython driver for the VL53L1X ToF sensor.

### Sensors / Human Presence

*   [ld2410 (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/ld2410.py) - 24GHz human presence sensing module, capable of detecting moving and stationary targets, and providing an approximate range.

### Sensors / Proximity

*   [apds9960 (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/apds9960.py) - MicroPython Driver for the APDS9960, with simple gesture detection.
items.content_html:
Audio

  • yx5300 (‚≠ê11) - MP3 player that can be controlled via a serial interface.

Display / E-Paper

  • uc8151_micropython (‚≠ê151) - UC8151 / IL0373 MicroPython e-paper display driver with support for greyscales and fast updates.

Display / LCD Character

  • micropython_i2c_lcd (‚≠ê5) - MicroPython library for interacting with HD44780-based LCD displays through a PCF8574 I/O expander. It offers a high-level API for LCD control, including text display, cursor manipulation, and backlight settings, while also providing lower-level access to the GPIO operations on the PCF8574.

Display / LED Matrix

  • LED_panel_upy (‚≠ê2) - MicroPython driver module for Panel P10 32x16 Matrix display and its variants.

IO / Multiplexer

  • tca9548a (‚≠ê11) - MicroPython driver for the TCA9548A I2C multiplexer.

Sensors / Biometric

  • max30102 (‚≠ê11) - MicroPython driver for the MAX30102, with heartbeat detection and BPM measurement.

Sensors / Camera

  • huskylib (‚≠ê11) - MicroPython driver for the DFRobot Husky Lens. An easy-to-use AI Camera / Vision Sensor, featuring face recognition, object tracking, object recognition, line tracking, color recognition, and QR code recognition.

Sensors / Distance Laser

  • vl53l1x (‚≠ê11) - MicroPython driver for the VL53L1X ToF sensor.

Sensors / Human Presence

  • ld2410 (‚≠ê11) - 24GHz human presence sensing module, capable of detecting moving and stationary targets, and providing an approximate range.

Sensors / Proximity

  • apds9960 (‚≠ê11) - MicroPython Driver for the APDS9960, with simple gesture detection.
